intro: The v-progress-circular component is used to convey data circularly to users. It also can be put into an indeterminate state to portray loading.

indeterminate.heading: Indeterminate
indeterminate.intro: Using the indeterminate prop, a v-progress-circular continues to animate indefinitely.

rotate.heading: Rotate
rotate.intro: The rotate prop gives you the ability to customize the v-progress-circular's origin.
